Package de.oth.blocklib.networking.nio

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcknowledgeField
    Contains information about which packets have been acknowledged.
    NetworkPacket
    Defines the basic structure of a packet that is transmitted over the network.
    A packet encapsulates a set of coherent data sent together with control fields which are needed by the network stack.
    NioClientNetworkLayer
    Network layer implementation for ClientNetworkManagers which are using NetworkLayerType.NIO.
    NioNetworkConnection
    NetworkConnection implementation for endpoints using NetworkLayerType.NIO.
    This class represents a connection between two endpoints.
    NioNetworkLayer
    Abstract base class for both NioClientNetworkLayer and NioServerNetworkLayer
    Implements core features both NioNetworkLayers need.
    Defines constants needed by both NioNetworkLayers.
    NioServerNetworkLayer
    Network layer implementation for ServerNetworkManagers which are using NetworkLayerType.NIO.
    ReliableNetworkPacket
    Defines the basic structure of a packet that is transmitted over the network.
    A packet encapsulates a set of coherent data sent together with control fields which are needed by the network stack.
    SequenceNumber
    This class implements operations that handle number wrap-arounds.
